p_63: Dashes ("-") indicate data for a particular field are not provided for this program in Residency Explorer. Reasons why data are not being provided can vary (e.g., they are not reported or available, they are not applicable, or they are based on an insufficient number of people for reporting purposes).

th_98: # of Residents Who Were Graduates of a Joint MD-PhD program
p_101: "The Tulane diagnostic radiology residency provides residents with an excellent volume and variety of cases through inpatient, outpatient and emergency department settings. The Tulane hospital experience is supplemented by rotations with the Children's Hospital of New Orleans, the New Orleans's VA and a private practice interventional radiologist. We are also able to offer ESIR (early specialization in interventional radiology) to one resident per year."
